page.title: 03Employment near Longdon
page.content:
Though this is a farming area most workers are not employed in agriculture. Several travel by car or works mini-bus to{Dowty mining}and the {Army Vehicle Maintainance Depot} in {Tewkesbury.} Two people travel to {Smiths Industries }near Cheltenham. Others work at a local{saw mill}and {coffin factory.
{ Husband and wife }teams work at the Primary School, a pub/shop/post-office and a mobile home park with a touring caravan site attached.
All but two of the ten{farms}in the area are small family businesses. The exceptions are a pig farm and a poultry farm, the latter being a subsidiary of a Hereford firm but which employs local labour.
